short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds russian authors to any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add quotes by famous Russian authors to any website.  It defaults to showing up 100% of the time, but if for some weird reason you want it to show up less often, that's available as a setting.
